press_release.headline: Introducing ResearchSync: Transform Customer Interviews into Strategic Documents
press_release.one_liner: AI-powered synthesis of customer research into actionable PR-FAQ documents
press_release.problem_statement: Product teams spend 40% of their time manually consolidating customer research, with synthesis taking 3-5 weeks per project.
press_release.solution_overview: ResearchSync automates research synthesis, generating PR-FAQ documents in hours with standardized format and version control.

faq.question: How much time does ResearchSync save?
faq.answer: ResearchSync reduces synthesis time from 3-5 weeks to 2-3 days, saving 80+ hours per project.

faq.question: Can teams collaborate on documents?
faq.answer: Yes, with built-in editing tools, version history, and commenting for real-time collaboration.

faq.question: What format does ResearchSync output?
faq.answer: PR-FAQ documents are generated in JSON format and can be exported to PDF, Markdown, and HTML.

faq.question: How accurate are the AI-generated insights?
faq.answer: Each PR-FAQ includes a confidence score (0-1) based on research completeness.

faq.question: Can I customize the PR-FAQ template?
faq.answer: Yes, the minimal PR-FAQ format can be customized via Jinja2 templates.

faq.question: What customer segments are identified?
faq.answer: Each FAQ item is linked to synth persona archetypes based on research findings.

faq.question: How is version control handled?
faq.answer: All PR-FAQ edits are tracked with timestamps and version numbers.

faq.question: What happens if the research batch has incomplete data?
faq.answer: The generator extracts insights from available sections and flags missing data.
